DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether low calorie diet stabilize improve diabetic kidney disease .
DOC.brief_title: Very Low Calorie Diet Diabetic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Age > 18 Body mass index â‰¥ 30 Presumed biopsyproven diabetic nephropathy Estimated GFR < 40 ml/min/1.73 meter square Proteinuria > 0.5 gm/day Motivated lose weight Stable medical comorbidities Using ACE inhibitor angiotensin receptor blocker agent ( unless contraindicate ) Inability sign inform consent Life expectancy < 1 year Expected need initiation dialysis within 9 month Type 1 Diabetes Recent myocardial infarction stroke ( past 3 month ) Unstable angina Active cancer Pregnancy/lactation Serious psychiatric disease Substance abuse Uncontrolled hypertension ( > 180/110 ) Ineligible VLCD base laboratory data
